thread.section_title: CeX/WeBuy - United Kingdom Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of webuy.com
thread.title: Louis
thread.title_full: CeX/WeBuy - United Kingdom reviewed by Louis

author: Louis
title: Louis
text: CeX obviously only supplies pre-owned products. When my item came from delivery, which was very quick, it was very well protected in layers of bubble wrap. The box was a little misleading, but of course the product was pre-owned so thats acceptable. Product came with a 2 year warranty, was clean and I also got it for a great price. Overly I had a very good experience with CeX and would reccomend to anyone, especially if on a budget.
